description: Multi-source quantitative trading toolkit for structured data retrieval and real-time trading - supports exchanges, financial data providers, and blockchain sources

features.name: QuantStrategy Abstract Base Class
features.description: Abstract base class for creating custom trading strategies with signal generation and position calculation

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Calculate returns and Sharpe ratio for backtesting and analysis

features.name: Exchange Integration
features.description: Multi-exchange support with unified interface for 1024 Exchange and others

features.name: Modular API Architecture
features.description: Modular API with separate modules for Perp, Spot, Prediction, Championship, and Account

features.name: Unified Interfaces
features.description: Standardized interfaces for market data, trading, positions, and advanced orders

features.name: Data Retrieval
features.description: Multi-source data retrieval with adapters for different data sources

features.name: Live Trading
features.description: Real-time trading support with WebSocket and Webhook integration

features.name: Monitor Feeds
features.description: Runtime monitoring and reporting for trading operations

features.name: Exception Handling
features.description: Custom exceptions for API errors, authentication, rate limits, and trading errors

features.name: HMAC Authentication
features.description: HMAC-based authentication for secure API access

notes: This is a Python library/SDK for quantitative trading. It does not have HTTP API endpoints but provides programmatic APIs for trading strategies, data retrieval, and exchange integration.
